file_name: smartrxsystemsinc_20180914_1-a_ex1a-6 mat ctrct_11351705_ex1a-6 mat ctrct_distributor agreement.pdf

perturbation.original_text: Background IP or "Background Technology" means existing Intellectual Property not generated in the course of the Company's Business and owned by Smart RX Systems, Inc.
perturbation.changed_text: Background IP or "Proprietary Technology" means existing Intellectual Property not generated in the course of the Corporation's Business and owned by Smart RX Systems, Inc.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Background Technology' is changed to 'Proprietary Technology'. Although both terms refer to intellectual property, the contract now uses two different terms for essentially the same concept, potentially creating confusion about what exactly is covered under this section.

perturbation.original_text:
Customers shall have the meaning as set forth in Section 2.5.
Intellectual Property means any Invention, Patent, trade secret, technical know-how, trademark, or work for which copyright protection is available under Title 17 of the United States Code.
Invention means an invention patentable under Title 35 of the United States Code, or any patent on such an invention.
perturbation.changed_text:
Clients shall have the meaning as set forth in Section 2.5.
Intellectual Property means any Innovation, Patent, trade secret, technical know-how, trademark, or work for which copyright protection is available under Title 17 of the United States Code.
Innovation means an invention patentable under Title 35 of the United States Code, or any patent on such an invention.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Customers' is changed to 'Clients' and 'Invention' is changed to 'Innovation'. The contract now uses two different terms for essentially the same concept, potentially creating confusion about who exactly is covered under this section.

perturbation.original_text: Operations Expense means all operating costs incurred in the operations of the Pharmacy (Wages, Taxes, and benefits of Pharmacist and or Pharmacy Tech, Liability Insurance of $100/month, miscellaneous expenses not exceeding $250/month, Fax, Phone, Internet, cost of supplies (Paper, cartridges, vials, vial caps, envelopes, prescription labels). The supplies costs are a flat fee of $0.75 per prescription filled). Operating costs exclude the cost of space and utilities.
perturbation.changed_text: Operating Costs means all operating costs incurred in the operations of the Pharmacy (Wages, Taxes, and benefits of Pharmacist and or Pharmacy Tech, Liability Insurance of $100/month, miscellaneous expenses not exceeding $250/month, Fax, Phone, Internet, cost of supplies (Paper, cartridges, vials, vial caps, envelopes, prescription labels). The supplies costs are a flat fee of $0.75 per prescription filled). Operational costs exclude the cost of space and utilities.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Operations Expense' is changed to 'Operating Costs', while later in the same paragraph, 'Operating costs' is replaced with 'Operational costs'. This introduces two different terms for the same concept in the same block of text which can cause confusion.
